lex.text: William Anders, who retired on September 1st, 1969, was a crew member on Apollo 8 and served under commander Frank Borman. Apollo 8 was operated by NASA with Buzz Aldrin as backup pilot.

BRIDGE-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=past,voice=passive,person=null,number=singular] operate by PATIENT-4 with PATIENT-3 as backup pilot .

sentence.striple: William_Anders | was a crew member of | Apollo_8

lex.text: William Anders joined NASA and was a member of Apollo 8 along with Frank Borman as Commander and Buzz Aldrin as back up pilot. William Anders retired on September 1st 1969.
lex.template: AGENT-1 joined PATIENT-4 and was a member of BRIDGE-1 along with PATIENT-2 as Commander and PATIENT-3 as back up pilot . AGENT-1 retired on PATIENT-1 .
